question_text: What are driver updates in video troubleshooting and what is the proper procedure for updating them?
answer_options: Automatic system updates that occur without user intervention
Bug fixes and performance improvements - download from manufacturer, use DDU, install new drivers
Hardware modifications that require physical component replacement
Network configuration changes that affect video streaming quality
correct_answer: Bug fixes and performance improvements - download from manufacturer, use DDU, install new drivers
explanation: Driver updates provide bug fixes, performance improvements, and new features for video cards. Procedure: 1) Download latest drivers from manufacturer (NVIDIA/AMD), 2) Use Display Driver Uninstaller (DDU) to completely remove old drivers, 3) Restart in safe mode, 4) Install new drivers, 5) Restart normally, 6) Test stability and performance. Always create restore point before updating.
